text: Roberto Pasqual Pistarini (born 28 April 1948) is an Argentine equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Argentina Category:Equestrians at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires
title: Roberto Pistarini
